This fully-furnished home is for exclusive sale, realistically priced at AED 75,000,000.
The property showcases a soothing lakeside view that is going to steal your attention. And there's the exciting veranda for chillaxing in your downtime.
The villa comes with unlimited use of a cooling infinity-edged pool, along with a golf course, a health club, a private gym, and a children's playground for your sport and outdoor related interests.
Imaginative remodellings have been done throughout that will add delightful detail to your home.
- 10 abounding bedrooms
- 14 bathrooms including ensuites
- a classy galley-style kitchen
- a dining & living room
- an entrance hall
- a home cinema
- a game's room in the basement with Billiard table, Ping Pong table, big bar

- arresting grand staircase
- charming fit out

- private infinity pool
- 100% private full Golf Course and Lake View
- 3 Floors with lift, basement, ground floor, upper floor
- 29,300 sq.ft land plot
- Smart System controlling All electronics throughout the villa
- Corner plot and 100% private villa
- full Wifi CCTV and sound system connected to the villa and garden
- all bedrooms systems, CCTV, living rooms, TV's, sound systems, lights, AC, curtains, works with Apple IPAD
Don't hesitate to buy this amazing bargain because lightning doesn't strike twice!!!
Call Babak, Property Finder Outstanding Agent for January 2020 and you can guarantee you are in good hands."]

['DescriptionAzco Real Estate Brokers (LLC) is proud to offer you this astonishing and elegantly designed property located in the most sought-after residential community in Dubai, Jumeirah Village Circle.
PROPERTY FEATURES 
■ 1 Bedroom Apartment
■ 2 Bathrooms
■ Balcony
■ Huge Kitchen
■ Built-in Wardrobes
■ Exquisite Design
AMENITIES
■ Gymnasium
■ Swimming Pool
■ Covered Car Parking 
■ 24 Hour Security equipped with CCTV
■ High Speed Elevators
■ Convenient Waste Disposal in every floor
■ Location: Chaimaa Avenue
CONTACT US
■ Ms. Radwa Elkordy - Property Consultant - JVC SPECIALIST
WHO WE ARE?
AZCO Real Estate Brokers, LLC. is an award winning and culturally diverse brokerage that brings together a team of multilingual and highly qualified real estate brokers. AZCO utilizes extensive expertise of the local market and internationalism of real estate. At AZCO, we exercise a client centrode approach that helps us to deliver end-to-end property management and real estate solutions.
The company has massively expanded from its official inception in 2017 to a team of 30+ exceptionally talented real estate brokers and consultants. All the solutions rendered at AZCO are formulated with a result-oriented perspective, while our competent brokers are always on the lookout for ideal property investment opportunities.
Buyers, Sellers, and Tenants can reach us anytime. Thank you for Choosing Azco Real Estate!
                                                       Visit our website: www.azcorealestate.ae']

descriptions: ['DescriptionExclusively with Edward and Towers is this 2 Bed + Maids, furnished apartment with stunning Lake and skyline views.Chiller free - 2 Bedrooms + Maids Room - 4 Bathrooms - 2 Balconies With Lake and Skyline Views - 1,581 Sq Ft - Furnished - Kitchen Appliances - High Floor - Shared Swimming Pool/Sauna/Steam Room and Gym This property is located in the most sought after part of JLT in the popular Green Lake Towers.\xa0 2 large bedrooms, both with en-suites and built in wardrobes. Large lounge and semi closed kitchen with all appliances included. Two balconies with lake and skyline views. Walking distance to metro and easy access to SZR. Available now.JLT is the perfect environment for both living and working. It contains a wide range of apartments, from the luxury of Green Lakes Towers and Madina Tower, to the affordable and convenient options There is a wide range of amenities including shops, restaurants, bars, parks and a gymnasium. If you are looking to establish and trade from a free-zone company, JLT is ideal.']
